tutorial: How to Set Up a Community Data Mine

definition.text: This tutorial is a reference to walk you through setting up a new Community Data Mine.  These mines contain definitions for many new data indicators.  For example, relative strength index (RSI), stochastic rating, moving average convergence divergence (MACD), etc.

paragraphs.text: There are a lot of moving pieces within Superalgos. The flexibility of Superalgos makes it powerful, but can also make it frustrating if you do not know how to get things working. This tutorial will walk you thorugh all the steps to get your Data Mine working without any headache.

Once a Community Data Mine is set up, you can use any of the indicators it holds within your trading strategies.  The community is continually improving and adding to these data mines.  You can even create one yourself!
